official_title: To temporarily suspend the duty on certain aluminum plates, sheets, and strips that are products of Bahrain.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1992, the duty on certain aluminum plates, sheets, and strips that are products of Bahrain.

titles.title: To temporarily suspend the duty on certain aluminum plates, sheets, and strips that are products of Bahrain.
